ingredients.ingredient: 3 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast meat
1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup
1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of celery soup
1 (6 ounce) package seasoned cornbread stuffing mix

cookingTips: Poach chicken gently in broth, then shred or cube into bite-sized pieces
Mix soups and milk together before combining with other ingredients
Sprinkle stuffing mix on top during the last 15 minutes of baking for crispness
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the cook through poaching chicken and explain when to add the stuffing for optimal texture.
